name: Aether Swatch
description:
Aether Swatch is a top-down shooter hack n' slash game about a little painter exploring big breathing paintings. Restore the former glory of masterpieces!

The goal of the game is to collect paint and use it to colour the totems in each painted world. These totems are structures that ward off evil monsters!

Features:

  • Smooth omni-directional player movement
  • Dashing short distances
  • Melee combat
  • Ranged combat
  • Enemy monsters with their own traits and attacks
  • Paint, for firing projectiles and restoring totems
  • Multiple painted levels and a gallery hub world
  • A painting overseer named Roko and their tutorial realm

Controls:

  • WASD keys to move around
  • Spacebar to dash
  • Left click to perform a melee attack
  • Right click to perform a ranged attack
  • Q and E to swap between paints
  • R to interact with objects
  • Escape to access the men

Release Date: November 18th 2022

Price: Free!

Developer: Miilk Bar Studios

Contact: games.miilk@gmail.com
